data.name: Game of Lust
data.detailed_description:
For the past hundred years, war has been everywhere on the land of Gaia. Human kingdoms has fought each other fiercely to become the true lord of Gaia. Some rulers believed that they can plot and gain advantage from hidden ancient races, but soon they found their stupid plots enraged these powerful races. Beastmen, elves, dark elves, vampires, and draconian armies rose up and quickly took over the world. Human found their kingdoms in vain.

[Game Features]──────────────────────────────────────────▣

  • Unique strategy H game
    Defeat the ancient races, and collect resources like gold, food and ladies!

  • Exciting dice battle
    customize your unique army abilities to win combats with best results.

  • Many hidden events are waiting for you to explore
    Win the hearts of sexy ladies from varies races like dark elves, vampires, beastmen, etc.

  • Multiple routes are worth playing again
    Hidden story events are there for different ladies, can you manage to find them out?

  • A friendly mechanism for easy play
    Your choices will change the world. Replay the game to face different challenging stages!

[How to play]]──────────────────────────────────────────▣

  • Goal: To train your army and commanders, win the battles, and collect all the sexy ladies from varies ancient races on the land of Gaia.

  • Gameplay: Customize your army with their abilities to get a better dice results. The army with higher number of dice result, will win a round and destroy one enemy army. Lean to find enemy weakness and use different solder type to beat them.

  • Tips: Each commander has unique leader skills. Use correct combo to beat varies enemy armies.

data.short_description: Human race is facing extinction, as a fameless bandit surviving in the last human kingdom, will you be able to use your wisdom and unlimited sexual energy to restore the dying kingdom?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, Sexual assault, Non-consensual sex, Public Sex, Hentai, Coarse Language, Violence, War and plunder.
All characters appearing in this game are over the age of 18.
